author: brane
msg: Make the svnadmin tests succed with FS_TYPE=fsfs-v6.
(create_in_repo_subdir): Skip if the new predicate applies.
(load_ignore_dates): Ignore r0, its properties aren't affected by the

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-6268: HdfsUpdateLog has a race condition that can expose a closed HDFS FileSystem instance and should close it's FileSystem instance if either inherited close method is called.

author: julianfoad
msg: * STATUS: Mention the backport branch for the r1619380 group.

author: brane
msg: Teach our cmdline tests to use a pre-cooked FSFSv6 repository
(create_repos): If the FSFS version option is set, find and use an
appropriate empty template repository instead of creating one
(freeze_same_uuid): Use the new predicate; the test now covers BDB as well.
zipped empty repository created by svnadmin 1.8.10 on a Mac.
